welcomeMessage: Welcome to manny's brain, where anything is possible. Let's get it rolling

HowMuchHeLoveHer.text: Manny loves jime more than a fat kid loves cake.

HowMuchHeMissHer.text: Manny misses Jime so much, it will be jerky jerk town for a week

options: On {DayOfWeek}'s, {Friend} loves to go out of he's way to down a drum of juicy semen
It is very unusual for {Friend} to miss out on some, always welcoming, ball licking on {DayOfWeek}
On {DayOfWeek}, you can find {Friend} at club, looking for the perfect man to moisterize his chest with slimy jizz.

There's a story about {Friend} that took place in Mexico. From what I hear, he had so much fun that he came back to America with a messed up leg and was even carried to his room in a wheel chair. Classic {Friend}.
Thank you for hangin with me today. See you on the flip side jabrony.
You are done with me??? No, I'm done with you. Goodbye!
